item.title: Easiest way to make PK Area?
item.dc:creator: @Modtacular Modtacular
item.description:
@Modtacular wrote:

Whats the easiest way to make a PK area?

i tried putting in the coords of the area i want to be the PK area, and reversing the output, but it didnt work

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 2767 && absX <= 2762 && absY >= 2774 && absY <=2767 ) || heightLevel == 1) return false; else return true; }

the original had a bunch of coords for safe spots, and it said

return [b]true[/b]; else return [b]false[/b];

help would be greatley appreciated

Read full topic
